title: The largest lakes in the U.S. in 2003 , by area
summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Lakes In The Us, and Area in square miles in each Lakes In The Us on the y axis.
The Area in square miles is appeared to be the highest at Lakes In The Us Lake Superior and lowest at Lakes In The Us Rainy Lake.
The highest Lakes In The Us Lake Superior has 31355.0 more Area in square miles than the lowest Lakes In The Us Rainy Lake.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Lakes In The Us in the x axis and Area in square miles in the y axis.
The maximum Area in square miles 31700.0 is found at Lakes In The Us Lake Superior and the minimum is found at Rainy Lake where Lakes In The Us is 345.0.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Lakes In The Us, and Area in square miles in each Lakes In The Us on the y axis.
The Area in square miles is appeared to be the highest at Lakes In The Us Lake Superior and lowest at Lakes In The Us Rainy Lake.
The highest Lakes In The Us Lake Superior has 31355.0 more Area in square miles than the lowest Lakes In The Us Rainy Lake.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Area in square miles for 20 number of Lakes In The Uss.
The maximum Area in square miles 31700.0 is found at Lakes In The Us Lake Superior and the minimum is found at Rainy Lake where Lakes In The Us is 345.0.
The highest Lakes In The Us Lake Superior has 31355.0 more Area in square miles than the lowest Lakes In The Us Rainy Lake.
The Lakes In The Us Lake Superior has the highest Area in square miles, followed by Lake Huron, and Lake Michigan. Down to the Lakes In The Us Rainy Lake which is the lowest.
The average Area in square miles in all 20 Lakes In The Uss is 5232.65.
The Area in square miles is 104653.0 if we add up values of all Lakes In The Uss.
